page.title: 01GENERAL INFORMATION
page.content: This four by three kilometres block is a very rural area and farming is the only industry.This consists mainly of intensively managed grassland and dairy herds. The inhabitants of this area need to have their own transport but there is public transport in some of the adjacent blocks.Churches,schools,post offices and small village shops are also in nearby squares.The doctor from Castle Cary has surgeries in church halls,half an hour every day,again adjacent to these blocks. The area is sparsely populated.
